name.zh-CN: 编辑markdown消息发送到群组中

desc.en-US: Sends a message in markdown format to a group by bot，supports various message types such as pictures.
desc.zh-CN: 在群组中运用机器人以markdown格式发送信息，支持图片等多种消息类型。

desc.en-US: Please input the title of the message.
Please input the message content in markdown format.
desc.zh-CN: 请以markdown格式输入消息内容。

desc.en-US: If you want to mention someone to read the message specifically, you can add their mobile numbers corresponding to their DingTalk account.
desc.zh-CN: 如果您想专门提醒群组中部分用户查看消息，可在此处添加他们与钉钉账户相关的电话号码。

desc.en-US: If you want to mention someone to read the message specifically, you can add their user IDs.
desc.zh-CN: 如果您想专门提醒群组中部分用户查看消息，可在此处添加他们的用户ID。

desc.en-US: Choose True if you want to mention everyone in the group to read the message.
desc.zh-CN: 如果您想提醒群组中所有人查看消息，请选择是。
